original_text:
For the Lord God is a sun and shield;
    the Lord bestows favor and honor.
No good thing does he withhold
    from those who walk uprightly.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님은 해요 방패이시라 여호와께서 은혜와 영화를 주시며 정직하게 행하는 자에게 좋은 것을 아끼지 아니하실 것임이니이다

sentences.original_text: For the Lord God is a sun and shield
the Lord bestows favor and honor.
No good thing does he withhold
